lines.text: [after threatening to expose the garage's books unless the manager pleases her]
Uh, I think everything seems to be in order here. I'll see you next year...
[after a customer seduces a car salesman]
So you must want the car, ha? Will you buy the car?
No, not now. I got what I come for.
Ok, whatever, Dick. This is the car for you. Really, have a sit. A man in your position, leather sits. It would drive the girls wild, trust me. Oh, I am getting wet just
[suddenly puts his hand between her thighs]
[after a customer's wife seduces the car salesman]
I get to drive away in my new car?
You get to drive away in your brand new Mercedes. With your husband, mind you.
[the wife suddenly continues giving the car salesman a fellatio]
Hmm, what do you want, a second car?
